Author: TheLittlestPineapple
Text: This is really relatable. The desire to lose weight is so strong, but I’m scared of hitting my ugw at the same time. It’s such a low weight, and I’m getting closer. Will I even look skinny enough at that weight? Plus, what is there to do afterwards? Get to a lower weight? Can’t offer much other than solidarity, but yeah, I know how you feel :/
